row.process:
@echo off
! ---------------------------------- Building java arguments --------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "SendMessageAction"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JAVA_COMMAND@WIN
! Topic : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KFK_TOPIC# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -topic &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Message : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KFK_MESSAGE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -message &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Retry Count : SET &UC4RB_KFK_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#, " -retrycount &UC4RB_KFK_RETRY_COUNT#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_KFK_CMD#
&UC4RB_KFK_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SEND MESSAGE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SEND MESSAGE ACTION FAILED ********"
! ------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_APACHE_KAFKA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
